text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

text: You have power over your mind, not outside events.  Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
author: Seneca

text: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: David Goggins

text: Mastering others is strength.  Mastering yourself is true power.
author: Lao Tzu

text: It is better to conquer self than to win a thousand battles.
author: Buddha

text: There is no magic wand that can resolve our problems. The solution rests with our work and discipline.
author: Jose Eduardo dos Santos

text: Small disciplines repeated with consistency every day lead to great achievements gained slowly over time.
author: John C. Maxwell

text: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
author: Horace

text: A disciplined mind leads to happiness, and an undisciplined mind leads to suffering.
author: Dalai Lama

text: We must all suffer one of two things:  the pain of discipline or the pain of regret and disappointment.
author: Jim Rohn

text: True freedom is impossible without a mind made free by discipline.
author: Mortimer J. Adler

text: Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
author: Mike Ditka

text: Discipline is doing what you really don't want to do so you can do what you really want to do.
author: Jeff Fisher

text: Discipline is just doing the same thing the right way whether anyone's watching or not.
author: Michael J. Fox

text: Success is not about motivation, it is about discipline
author: Glody Kikonga

text: Your DISCIPLINE is going to Pay off sooner than you think. BE PATIENT
author: Kewal Nautiyal

text: Honest and disciplined decisions are almost never regretted.
author: Marion Bekoe

text: More important than the courage to confront a Dragon of Deception is the discipline required to sharpen the Sword of Truth.
author: Gavin Nascimento

text: Discipline is a series of intentional choices that you continuously make, not just a trait you magically possess.
author: Jen Alvares

text: True freedom comes from discipline. When you master the small, everyday choices, you unlock the power to control your life and achieve more.
author: Brian Reese

text: The weight of regret is heavier than the burden of discipline—choose wisely.
author: Aloo Denish Obiero

text: Your dreams won’t come true overnight. It takes dedication, strong determination, and discipline to make them a reality.
author: Onipede Ayomide

text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

text: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

text: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
author: Alice Walker

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

text: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

text: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Success starts with self-discipline.
author: Unknown

text: Fitness is like marriage; you can’t cheat and expect it to work.
author: Bonnie Pfiester

text: Be stronger than your strongest excuse.
author: Unknown

text: Chase goals, not excuses.
author: Unknown

text: Your future self will thank you.
author: Unknown

text: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Strong doesn’t come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

text: Success isn’t about greatness, it’s about consistency.
author: Unknown

text: Your only limit is your mind.
author: Unknown

text: You are stronger than you think.
author: Unknown

text: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Train insane or remain the same.
author: Unknown

text: The pain you feel today will be strength tomorrow.
author: Unknown

text: Discipline outlasts motivation.
author: Unknown

text: Learn to rest, not quit.
author: Banksy

text: Clear your mind of can’t.
author: Samuel Johnson

text: Fitness is a journey, not a destination.
author: Unknown

text: The difference between try and triumph is a little ‘umph’!
author: Marvin Phillips

text: Progress happens one step at a time.
author: Unknown

text: It’s not about perfect; it’s about effort.
author: Jillian Michaels

text: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
author: Unknown

text: The only bad workout is the one that didn’t happen.
author: Unknown

text: Wake up with determination; sleep with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

text: Your body can do anything; it’s your mind you have to convince.
author: Unknown

text: It won’t be easy, but it’ll be worth it.
author: Cas McCullough

text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated daily.
author: Robert Collier

text: Do something your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

text: Recovery is just as important as the workout.
author: Gunnar Peterson

text: A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures.
author: Irish Proverb

text: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can’t go on — and in the moments you choose to recover.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

text: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise — and rest.
author: Gene Tunney

text: Your muscles are torn in the gym, but rebuilt in rest.
author: Unknown

text: Rest and self-care are so important. When you take time to replenish your spirit, it allows you to serve from overflow.
author: Eleanor Brownn

text: The time to relax is when you don’t have time for it.
author: Sydney J. Harris

text: True recovery begins the moment discipline includes rest.
author: Unknown

text: Without rest, there is no progress.
author: Unknown

text: Train hard. Rest harder.
author: Unknown
